Posts.Content: I'm an NHS patient at the dentist and when I went to check out, I showed the card to the receptionist and asked if this also covered dental treatment.  She checked with the dentist and I walked out without having to pay - the only perk I've found so far of having BC!
Posts.Title: Medical Exemption Certificate

Posts.Content: The medical exemption certificate also covers NHS dental treatment as I found out last week:-)
Posts.Title: Medical Exemption Certificate

Posts.Content: On reading some of the above posts, I checked my card and I think I may have just got lucky and the receptionist didn't really know what she was looking at.  They'll probably catch up with me:-(
Posts.Title: Medical Exemption Certificate
